title: Retirement planning integrates care economy participation
description: Retirement planning integrates care economy participation
content:
Scenario: Retirement planning integrates care economy participation
    Given Robert is in pre-retirement years
    And retirement planning should include care economy dimensions
    And his care contributions should be valued in retirement
    When workplace_elohim supports retirement planning
    Then it should help him plan retirement that honors care economy participation
    And surface how accumulated care tokens could support retirement
    And explore retirement roles that leverage care economy expertise
    And help him transition from full-time employment to care economy contribution
    And recognize that retirement can include meaningful care economy participation
    And build retirement vision that includes continued community contribution
    And demonstrate that care economy operates across full lifecycle
